battleship2000.programlogic.domain.table

Class GameTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • battleship2000.programlogic.domain.table.GameTable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Table

    public class GameTable
extends Object
implements Table
    GameTable class implements the Table interface and works as a storage to its squares and their placement on the game table.
    Author:
    Petri Kallio

      • checkCoordinatesAreOnTheTable

        public boolean checkCoordinatesAreOnTheTable(int x,
                                    int y)
        Description copied from interface: Table
        Checks if the Table contains a Square whose coordinates are the same as given as parameters.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate
        y - the y-coordinate
        Returns:

      • getSquaresBasedOnDirection

        public List<Square> getSquaresBasedOnDirection(Square square,
                                      Direction direction,
                                      int amount)
        Description copied from interface: Table
        Returns a list of Squares counting from the Square given as parameter to the Direction given as parameter.

        The amount of Squares on the list that is returns may differ from the amount given as parameter, as the Table's width or height might run out before the amount is met.

        Specified by:
        getSquaresBasedOnDirection in interface Table
        Parameters:
        square - the Square from which to start counting
        direction - the Direction to which to start counting
        amount - the amount of Squares to add to the list at maximum
        Returns:
